name: Clumsy Flights
description:
Mini Jam 56: Sky
Words: War Zone & Doughnut


"A Giant Donut has appeared in the sky emitting an anti-gravity field."
"Light weighted human beings are attracted and used to feed the Giant Donut's army."
"One day, a military man mannaged to bring a bomb with him during his last flight."
"At the cost of his life, he made a big hole in the Giant Donut."
"This is our chance..."

Choose the gear you want to take in the sky to fight and defend yourself against flying donuts. You must bring a bomb and you won't fly if your too heavy: Mind the weight requirement.

  • Left CLick on the right/ left to move (and attack if you have a weapon).
  • Hold Left Click to charge up (the Move/Attack further).
  • Right Click to Dodge.

Enter the Giant Donut and Explode !

Made with Construct 3 by Perlin.
SFX made with BFXR.
Music by Rolemusic.
